title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4022.4 - Representative of The Jockey Club
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4022.4 - Representative of The Jockey Club

State Regulations

The Jockey Club may designate one of its members to
visit each race meeting in an honorary capacity in association with the
stewards. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4022.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
